pages.text: Techguns can be used very early in a new world. The 'Hand Cannon' only needs a few logs and stones and 1 flint and iron ingot plus some gunpowder. Mobs using Techguns weapons may also be encountered early. Be careful when not geared yet.

pages.title: Starting out
pages.text: The first step is to collect some resources like iron, coal and maybe redstone and built a basic power generation setup (depends on what mods are installed). After power is available the first machines of techguns can be built, the $(l:machines/metal_press)Metal Press$(/l), the $(l:machines/ammo_press)Ammo Press$(/l), $(l:machines/chemical_laboratory)Chemical Laboratory$(/l) and the $(l:machines/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(/l). The $(l:machines/camo_bench)Camo Bench$(/l), the $(l:machines/repair_bench)Repair Bench$(/l) can also be used from the beginning but are not required to progress.

pages.title: Get Armor
pages.text: Since techguns mobs are dangerous you should get a full suit of one of the first three armor sets. This includes the 'Bandit Armor' which gives the best speed bonus and is good for scouting, the 'Miner Armor' which is best for mining or the 'Soldier Armor' which offers the best protection in gunfights.

pages.title: Get Weapons
pages.text: To better fight of mobs you should get a better weapon than a handgun. At this point all weapon requiring an 'Iron Receiver' can be built. The 'Power Hammer' is good mining tool and should also be built early to improve your mining speed. It can later be upgraded to higher mining levels.
